level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this Uniform Act [this chapter], consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to the subject matter among states enacting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-292
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following § 19-901.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 7 of the Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act.
